# About

SimpleBox Object Oriented (SBoo)is the latest version of the SimpleBox model programmed in R. This repository contains the functions that constitute the model. More information on SimpleBox can be found on the [RIVM website](https://www.rivm.nl/simplebox "simplebox")

For information the data and scripts see the repository: [rivm-syso/SBooScripts](https://github.com/rivm-syso/SBooScripts "SBooScripts").

# Repository structure
The SBoo repository contains one important folder named R. This folder contains all functions and R6 modules that together constitute SBoo.

# Use

For more information on how to use SBoo, see [this readme.](https://github.com/rivm-syso/SBooScripts/blob/development/README.md)
